export var questionObj = {
  "Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{l } = \frac{r }{m }
\]
Then show that 
\[
	\frac{p ^3 }{k ^3} + \frac{q ^3 }{l ^3} + \frac{r ^3}{m ^3} = \frac{3pqr }{klm }
\]
\newline

",
  "Steps": [{
    "id": "s1",
    "n_params": 0,
    "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{b } = \frac{r }{m } = n \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow p = kn , q = ln , r = mn 
\]
Now, left hand side of the equation can be written as 
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{p ^3 }{k ^3} + \frac{q ^3 }{l ^3} + \frac{r ^3}{m ^3}
\]
\[
	= \frac{(kn )^3}{k ^3} + \frac{(ln )^3}{l ^3} + \frac{(mn )^3}{m ^3} 
\]
\[
	= n ^3 + n ^3 + n ^3 = 3 n ^3
\]
Now, right hand side of the equation can be written as
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \frac{3 pqr }{klm }
\]
\[
	= \frac{3 (kn )(ln )(mn )}{klm }
\]
\[
	= 3n ^2
\]
From the above two expressions, we can see that
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"
  }]
};
export var resp = [{
  "data": [],
  "text": " "
}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{l } = \frac{r }{m }
\]
Then show that 
\[
	\frac{p ^3 }{k ^3} + \frac{q ^3 }{l ^3} + \frac{r ^3}{m ^3} = \frac{3pqr }{klm }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{b } = \frac{r }{m } = n \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow p = kn , q = ln , r = mn 
\]
Now, left hand side of the equation can be written as 
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{p ^3 }{k ^3} + \frac{q ^3 }{l ^3} + \frac{r ^3}{m ^3}
\]
\[
	= \frac{(kn )^3}{k ^3} + \frac{(ln )^3}{l ^3} + \frac{(mn )^3}{m ^3} 
\]
\[
	= n ^3 + n ^3 + n ^3 = 3 n ^3
\]
Now, right hand side of the equation can be written as
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \frac{3 pqr }{klm }
\]
\[
	= \frac{3 (kn )(ln )(mn )}{klm }
\]
\[
	= 3n ^2
\]
From the above two expressions, we can see that
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
